resources.purchaseLimitSetByMerchant: The merchant has required purchase limits to be enabled.
resources.purchaseLimitCondition: If this field is set to 0, all orders will require approval. If this field is empty, no orders will require approval.
resources.updateCancelModalMessage: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save them ?
resources.noApproversPresent: You must have atleast one active Contact set as Approver before enabling Approvals.
resources.approvalWebhookIsEnabled: You cannot set the purchase limit because the merchant is using an external system to determine if orders require approval.
